scripts.docker-push: docker tag <PACKAGE_NAME>:latest docker.enlinx.com/<PACKAGE_NAME>:latest & docker push docker.enlinx.com/<PACKAGE_NAME>:latest
scripts.docker-push:stage: docker tag <PACKAGE_NAME>:stage docker.enlinx.com/<PACKAGE_NAME>:stage & docker push docker.enlinx.com/<PACKAGE_NAME>:stage
scripts.docker-pub: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push
scripts.docker-pub:stage: npm run docker-build:stage && npm run docker-push:stage
